  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    BrobInt​(java.lang.String value)
    Constructor takes a string and assigns it to the internal storage, checks for a sign character and handles that accordingly; it then checks to see if it's all valid digits, and reverses it for later use

  • Constructor Details

    • BrobInt

      public BrobInt​(java.lang.String value)
      Constructor takes a string and assigns it to the internal storage, checks for a sign character and handles that accordingly; it then checks to see if it's all valid digits, and reverses it for later use
      Parameters:
      value - String value to make into a BrobInt

  • Method Details

    • validateDigits

      public void validateDigits()
      Method to validate that all the characters in the value are valid decimal digits
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if something is hinky note that there is no return false, because of throwing the exception note also that this must check for the '+' and '-' sign digits

    • add

      public BrobInt add​(BrobInt bint)
      Method to add the value of a BrobInt passed as argument to this BrobInt
      Parameters:
      bint - BrobInt to add to this
      Returns:
      BrobInt that is the sum of the value of this BrobInt and the one passed in

    • subtract

      public BrobInt subtract​(BrobInt bint)
      Method to subtract the value of a BrobIntk passed as argument to this BrobInt
      Parameters:
      bint - BrobInt to subtract from this
      Returns:
      BrobInt that is the difference of the value of this BrobInt and the one passed in

    • multiply

      public BrobInt multiply​(BrobInt bint)
      Method to multiply the value of a BrobIntk passed as argument to this BrobInt
      Parameters:
      bint - BrobInt to multiply this by
      Returns:
      BrobInt that is the product of the value of this BrobInt and the one passed in

    • divide

      public BrobInt divide​(BrobInt bint)
      Method to divide the value of this BrobIntk by the BrobInt passed as argument
      Parameters:
      bint - BrobInt to divide this by
      Returns:
      BrobInt that is the dividend of this BrobInt divided by the one passed in

    • remainder

      public BrobInt remainder​(BrobInt bint)
      Method to get the remainder of division of this BrobInt by the one passed as argument
      Parameters:
      bint - BrobInt to divide this one by
      Returns:
      BrobInt that is the remainder of division of this BrobInt by the one passed in

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo​(BrobInt bint)
      Method to compare a BrobInt passed as argument to this BrobInt
      Parameters:
      bint - BrobInt to compare to this
      Returns:
      int that is one of neg/0/pos if this BrobInt precedes/equals/follows the argument NOTE: this method does not do a lexicographical comparison using the java String "compareTo()" method It takes into account the length of the two numbers, and if that isn't enough it does a character by character comparison to determine

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(BrobInt bint)
      Method to check if a BrobInt passed as argument is equal to this BrobInt
      Parameters:
      bint - BrobInt to compare to this
      Returns:
      boolean that is true if they are equal and false otherwise

    • valueOf

      public static BrobInt valueOf​(long value) throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
      Method to return a BrobInt given a long value passed as argument
      Parameters:
      value - long type number to make into a BrobInt
      Returns:
      BrobInt which is the BrobInt representation of the long
      Throws:
      java.lang.NumberFormatException

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Method to return a String representation of this BrobInt
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      String which is the String representation of this BrobInt and appends a "-" in front if value is negative

    • removeLeadingZeros

      public BrobInt removeLeadingZeros​(BrobInt bint)
      Method to remove leading zeros from a BrobInt passed as argument
      Parameters:
      bint - BrobInt to remove zeros from
      Returns:
      BrobInt that is the argument BrobInt with leading zeros removed Note that the sign is preserved if it exists

    • allZeroDetect

      public boolean allZeroDetect​(BrobInt bint)
      Method to return a boolean if a BrobInt is all zeros
      Parameters:
      bint - BrobInt to compare to this
      Returns:
      boolean that is true if the BrobInt passed is all zeros, false otherwise

    • toArray

      public void toArray​(int[] d)
      Method to display an Array representation of this BrobInt as its bytes
      Parameters:
      d - byte array from which to display the contents NOTE: may be changed to int[] or some other type based on requirements in code above

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      the main method redirects the user to the test class
      Parameters:
      args - String array which contains command line arguments NOTE: we don't really care about these, since we test the BrobInt class with the BrobIntTester
